name: Rose Milk One-Shot
description:
This is the One-Shot for the rich and dense cheesecake with soft strawberry recipe Rose Milk

Pick up Rose Milk here:
(US) -- https://diyordie.link/rosemilk-atf
(UK/EU) -- https://diyordie.link/rosemilk-atf-uk
author: ENYAWREKLAW

reviews.text: Staple in my rotation and a fun recipe to play with. Personally can't believe this was ever released. You got a big heart Wayne! Thank you for this and the rest of your work!
SMH you know better than this.
It it really necessary to spam your one shot recipes? No, it really isnâ€™t. Gotta agree: cringe-worthy.
What is this? A free advertisement? Cringe-worthy...
Hahaha are you having a laugh. Bunch of people got excited by this. This is still a regular buy and a 5 star recipe. Well done.
